abstracts.cdata!:
This environmental assessment for the
            Romania Electricity Market Project sets forth the plan for
            mitigating potentially negative impacts. During
            construction, spray with water using pressurized water jets
            to control dust and earth removal activities, erect a dust
            protective barrier, and cover equipment and machinery. To
            reduce noise, execute during the daytime and avoid exceeding
            noise limits. Wastes shall be separated and stored within
            the substation area: collect waste oil in metallic tanks
            located on concrete foundations and dispose of solid waste
            in specially treated areas. Afterwards, remove waste and
            reuse or store waste. Unrecoverable inert wastes shall be
            taken to government approved dump sites. Remove topsoil and
            dispose of oil-contaminated soils in special areas. Restore
            sites by filling holes, leveling soil, and covering grass.
            PCB contaminated soil shall be removed and treated by
            licensed contractors using internationally accepted methods.
            During project operation, collect wastewater according to
            quality requirements. Alleviate air pollution by installing
            technologically capable machinery and using low-sulfur
            content fuel. Equip the diesel unit with a collecting tank
            and oil/water separator. Procure new equipment to decrease noise.
